message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $180.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Can you meet me halfway?
I understand your offer of $120, but I'm not willing to go that low. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway from my original offer. I'll sell the product to you for $165.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $145?
I'm not willing to go down to $145, but I'm willing to make a small concession. I'll sell the product to you for $157.50.
I'm still a bit above my budget, but I'm willing to meet you halfway from your last offer. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $152.50?
I'm not willing to go down to $152.50, but I'm willing to make another small concession. I'll sell the product to you for $159.00.
I'm getting close to my budget, but I'm still not willing to go above $155. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I'm not willing to go down to $155, but I'm willing to make another small concession. I'll sell the product to you for $158.50.
I'm really close to my budget, but I'm still not willing to go above $152. I'll make one final offer. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
